import About from "./About" function Banner({ featuredRecipe }) { return (

good food, good mood.

Ingredients
    {featuredRecipe.ingredients.map(ingredient =>
  • {ingredient.name}
    • )}
Instructions
    {featuredRecipe.directions.map(direction => { return (
  1. {direction.text}
    2. ) })}
) } export default Banner
